pros: Product made with fine glass  to protect phone
Glass is thin enough that fingerprint security sensor will still work
Customers rave about the company's fast customer service
cons: You must thoroughly clean your screen before application
Otherwise, bubbles will form around specks of dust

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Tech armor!
customer_reviews.text: So I dropped my iPhone today and Then stepped on it. When I looked at it the screen was shattered! To my surprise I forgot I had put this tech armor on the day I got my iPhone when I peeled it off my iPhone was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made & AWFUL warranty support
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this brand for several generations of iPhones. it's no doubt been a helpful product but after years of ownership i can clearly say the quality is very poor. breaks easily and can leave glass shards in your fingers. worst of all, they are an awful company when it comes to the warranty. ive had to deal with it SEVERAL times and it's never been a good experience. i found a new brand recently called maxboost and they include a quick snap on template for installing the cover which is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: jackson ball

customer_reviews.title: Effective but needs to be replaced often
customer_reviews.text: I've repeatedly purchased this Tech Armor Screen Protector many times. It was the first time I purchased a glass protector versus a plastic one, and this was more effective compared to plastic. However, I had to keep replacing it and eventually tried a different brand of glass protector to compare lasting power. Compared to that, this one was much less durable. I didn't know about the warranty before and that's why I bought a new one every time it broke (which was pretty much every time I dropped the phone). Would recommend taking advantage of the warranty program if purchased, but keep in mind that it does take time to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Explore Beauty XO

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be easier to install!
customer_reviews.text: I tried another brand screen protector that came with 2 films. Trashed both films because, even though I followed installation instructions, just couldn't stand the excessive air bubbles which I couldn't get out. So I was hesitant to try another brand in the same price range, but I ordered the Tech Armor screen protector (which came with 3) and I have to say I couldn't be happier! It was so easy and simple to install and NO air bubbles. Just follow instructions, make sure there is no dust on the phone screen is really important. Looks really nice on my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: VFW

customer_reviews.title: $4.95 Shipping on warranty service! Over %50 of original purchase!?!
customer_reviews.text: The Ballistic Glass Screen Protector I order started to see scratches, cracks and chips. I contacted Tech Armor for the "life time replacement warranty", and what a joke! $4.95 Shipping on warranty service! That's over %50 of original purchase I paid. Bait and switch, bamboozled, fool gazey, etc. You've been warned!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Screen!
customer_reviews.text: I got a small crack in my iPhone screen, so I purchased one of these at the recommendation of a friend to protect my screen from cracking further. It was easy to install and totally invisible to me during use. A couple of months after installing it, I dropped my phone (screen side down) on a tile floor. The screen protector cracked but my screen wasn't damaged further. I'm a believer! I quickly purchased another one of these to replace the earlier one because I want to hold onto my phone as long as possible!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Parris

customer_reviews.title: This saved my iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely "saved" by screen. I crashed and fell holding my phone and although the very bottom of the Tech Armor cover cracked slightly, the phone is still totally useable AND my iphone screen was unscathed. I am buying another just because!!! It went on perfectly, by the way. In fact, it is so discreet, my husband thought it was my iphone screen that had been damaged and was ready to go into the Apple store to get it replaced. I can do that now for less than the cost of gas to the Apple store. Thanks Tech Armor!
customer_reviews.author: Louise E. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Old fashion mounting system led to poor outcome
customer_reviews.text: I have been putting screen protectors on iPhones for many years, so I remember the bad old day - using this product is like going back in time. It used to be that it took great care to keep dust from getting between the screen and your phone - but in the last few years manufactures seem to have fixed this problem - not Tech Armor though. Bubble city baby! Sigh and since they only give you one screen protector I had to order new protectors. Try another company.

customer_reviews.title: Feels Like the Phone's Original Screen
customer_reviews.text: Update: After 1.5 years and countless phone drops, my Tech Armor ballistic glass screen protector finally cracked. No damage at all to the phone, for which I also have a Spigen Slim Armor case. I immediately ordered a replacement and installed it in under five minutes. The screen protector is functions just as well as the unprotected screen, with no installation hassles (easy to align, no bubbles). Well worth the price. I previously used Tech Armor's plastic film screen protectors, which I really liked, but when the last one was damaged by my keys, I decided to try the ballistic glass. It's easier to install, clearer, and has a better feel. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Best option out there, wish there were sticker guides to help alignment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for iPhone SE. Great protection at a very reasonable price point. This is more rigid and glass-like unlike some of the other "flexible" screen protectors. Zero bubble formation! I was able to lift and re-adjust 2 times before I got the alignment correct. Extremely clear and does not take away the clarity or brightness of the retina display I also have this on my iPhone 6 and when I dropped that phone the protector did crack but it saved my screen. Only con - there are other screen protectors that have sticker-based "guides" that make alignment easier. Wish Tech Armor did that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mufaddal Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Two Defective Protectors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of them and both appear to have "flatness" problems, failing to adhere along the top edge. I have an IPhone SE. I give three stars because I obtained a refund for both with no hassle. I had to go to the AT&T store and have them install one of their protectors at three times the price, but they are guaranteed. Theirs worked perfectly. They said it is likely a problem with the mold that Tech Armor was using. That may be, and most of their protectorss may be fine (a family member had no problem...different model IPhone), but mine failed two out of two times after precisely following directions.
customer_reviews.author: D. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice -As Described
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Clean, professional packaging. Accurate, understandable instructions Very good application kit/materials. Went on smoothly -per instructions. A small lift/fog smoothed out in about 15 minutes with time and rubbing. Fits snuggly, clear and virtually invisible. Can't talk to durability (yet); but having used these before on other phones, I am trusting it will be effective, if not great! (may follow up in six months-or after a fall/etc.) Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: markbc

customer_reviews.title: Replacement warranty pretty bad.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three screen protectors for most of the iPhone 5s phones in our house. They installed easily. But over the eighteen months they’ve been on, each of the screens have cracked. I reordered once for one replacement and once for two replacements. One of them has cracked again. But since I’ve gotten replacements twice, they won’t replace them again. But we ordered three and have only gotten three. It shouldn’t be the number of times I’ve reordered but the number of screen protectors. Interestingly, the other iPhone in our house that doesn’t have a Tech Armor shield hasn’t cracked at all. Hmmm ... guess I’m switching screen protectors. Not worth the hassle factor with Tech Armor.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Have ordered two 1 out of two good.
customer_reviews.text: Would be awesome of the shipping box it came in wouldnt get bent but thats not really on them. What is though is idk if it was related to the shipping damage but it started peeling off my phone when it was smooth no air bubbles before that. Only lasted a week will order a third for replacement to see how that goes. First one worked beautifully as long as it stays on the phone :) 3 out 5 for shipping damage and quality of glue. Will update on third after 2 weeks. Edit: adhesive failed on one side so there is a large bubble pocket of air between screen and this.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, best screen protector I have ever had. Lasted almost a year with me dropping my phone many many times (using an Otterbox Commuter Series Wallet - I also highly recommend). The screen protector did receive a few small cracks during a couple of drops but maintained it's overall integrity and didn't fall apart into pieces. The screen protector was still functional and I continued to use it without a problem. I finally decided (for aesthetic reasons) to remove my old one and my screen was pristine underneath. Just bought my 2nd!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Of Arc

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT AND GREAT CUSTOMER SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: My husband dropped his phone on the cement driveway, didn't notice it and drove out of the driveway over his iphone. He went out to look for the phone, didn't find it and drove back over it on the way in to the driveway. Tech Armour glass was shattered, but his iphone lives on...with no damage. He is on his third replacement (free, through Tech Armour website, just give your Amazon order number and date). THANK YOU TECH ARMOUR! GREAT PRODUCT AND GREAT CUSTOMER SUPPORT! We are lifetime customers, after hesitating to pay the ten bucks each for 4 of these to protect our families new iphones, I'm sure this is the best $40. I ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: GALE

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of clear glass
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I don't like clear coats. I bought this with the intention of replace my privacy, black screen. I tried my best to clean my phone to lessen the amount of dust and particles from catching underneath but putting this thing on amplified all of those deficiencies. If you can look past that sure its a good product but according to my preference, I can't stand it. 3/5
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wong

customer_reviews.title: Amazing company, great product, awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Tech Armor user for a few years now with all of my phones and as I expected, I was not let down! This screen protector fits perfectly on the iphone se and provides great protection. I previously had the Tech Armor ballistics glass on my LG G3 and my husband used that as a hammer, cracking the screen in a million places but causing no damage to the phone itself. Another time, I dropped the phone on something and the glass cracked - Tech Armor kept up their end of the deal and replaced it at no additional cost to me. The customer service is outstanding. I highly recommend this company and the ballistics glass!
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: So far this has been an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this when I bought my new Apple 6SE and it's worked flawlessly. I don't work in the harsh and demanding environments that other reviewers mentioned , but I so like to wait at least six months or more so I can provide decent feedback on my overall experience with a product. That said, I have dropped the phone on the cement several times and there are no visible scratches or cracks whatsoever. Would definitely recommend this to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lang

customer_reviews.title: excellent product. Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought another one of these screen protectors for my moms phone because I like mine so much. I like this screen protector. I really like that the screen is so clear and doesn't scratch. I had been using otterbox and lifeproof cases with built in screen protector. These always quickly got scratched. So far, I like this better. My protector did get a crack in it. I guess I dropped it one too many times. The company replaced it for a small fee even though it was my fault. I think it was $2.50 which was a lot less than I paid originally and I think that was really to cover shipping. I will buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: working mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Screen Protection
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this screen protector. My daughter dropped her phone on the slate floor and I heard the sickening crunch as it hit. Sure enough cracks. Took it to the Apple store and the technician said, "I think it's just the screen protector that's cracked... have you tried removing it?" Sure enough, the Tech Armor was cracked but my daughter's phone was perfect! So excited I bought another to replace it and bought them for my husband and I as well!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Harnick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I bought one some months back. Something put a tiny crack in it (keys in purse? dropping it?) It protected my iPhone screen. So, I bought 2 more just to have on hand. Easy to put on, no air bubbles, because it's stiff (not a flimsy film). Obviously, it did its job protecting my screen--and it's so much cheaper than the ones at Best Buy. Some such screen protectors boast that they filter out blue light. If you have a newer iPhone, you can go into settings and pick a warmer (yellower) setting for your display, which also reduces blue light. :)
customer_reviews.author: D. Cupples, Gainesville, Fla.

customer_reviews.title: Saved another iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter dropped er iPhone -- again. And this product protected the screen -- again! She did have to be careful not to cut her finger on the sharp edge of the cracked screen protector while awaiting the arrival of the new one. It is glass, after all. We love, love, love these screen protectors. They've saved us hundreds of $ in smartphone repairs. Don't change a thing and you'll have a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri A.

customer_reviews.title: Please disregard my earlier review! I was made whole.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Customer service is not good and good luck getting a replacement. I have tried communicating with them several times. I bought one for my phone and later needed a replacement and that went well, later I needed a replacement for my granddaughter phone. It was a completely different phone but because I requested a replacement for my phone they wouldn't offer a replacement for the other phone. Sent several emails with no reply. Too bad as my son-in-law used to recommend their screen protectors to everyone. Updated note: my apologies to Tech Armor! A replacement was sent to my grand daughter without my knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Was good at first but....
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector was great at first, very strong and durable. I've had this screen protector for now even 5 months. However, this week I've noticed a little crack in my screen protector and I'm confused to how it got there because I'm very careful with apple products, I haven't dropped my phone in a long time, and I have a case on my phone. I ignored it at first but now it's starting to grow across the screen and it's getting bigger, deeper, and more noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This product actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Tech armor is a fantastic product. Something hard hit my phone while I was at work- hard enough to leave a crack in the screen protector. I was so worried my screen was cracked too- I could see the crack but I couldn’t tell whether it was my phone screen or the screen protector. I peeled it off and sure enough the creep on my phone was crack free! I immediately bought a second tech armor screen protector. I recommend these to all of my friends. Best of all, if you’re like me and hate the flimsy plastic on otter box cases and tear it out, the tech armor screen protector fits under the case.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: works well to protect both pristine and previously scratched screens
customer_reviews.text: I had some surface scratches on my iPhone 5S screen and wanted to keep them from getting any worse. I could kick myself for not applying this when I first received my expensive phone. It does protect against getting those scratches in the first place over the weekend i actually dropped my phone onto a hard floor, and I can see a crack, but it is still a smooth surface with the glass screen protector, so I am glad that it is also protecting my face and fingertips from sharp edges too. I will have one ready to install on my next phone from the beginning...
customer_reviews.author: NOLAphotoladyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Customer Satisfaction!!!
customer_reviews.text: I chose Tech Armor this time because I had tried them before and was very pleased. The thing I like best about Tech Armor, beyond the quality of the product, it the quality of the customer service they provide. They truly want the customer to be happy. I had one corner that did not completely adhere, and Tech Armor replaced it no problem. They stand behind their product, even if installation was not their fault. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: William Chase

customer_reviews.title: Saved my old phone from damage
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this product. Needed a new one for the new phone. I dropped the old phone onto concrete twice. The first time the protector chipped at point of impact and at the touch dot. The second time it again chipped at point of impact and also cracked across the screen. These were hard hits too. Neither time did the phone screen chip or crack. The protector did its job and worked well for three years until the phone was deactivated. I did not hesitate to purchase this produce again for my new phone. It installs easily and the instructions are clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: mrgns

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar screen protector on my i-phone 5s and recently dropped my phone face down on concrete and cracked the protector. The protector did its job, as my screen did not sustain any damage. I quickly ordered this product as a replacement screen protector and am very pleased with the quality. It was super easy to install and fit perfectly. The price was great and it arrived right away. I highly recommend glass screen protectors - much better than the flimsy plastic sheets or other types. Also, the price for this product was less than half of what it would have cost if I had ordered it as an accessory through my cell phone service provider.
customer_reviews.author: Jody D.

customer_reviews.title: DUST FREE INSTALL, evertime!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time purchasing this Tech Armor screen protector. It is a super high quality protector. I have upgraded my IPhone and knew this was again the best screen protector on the market! It is very simple to install. Their video is really great. I have used others before and always have gotten dust trapped under the protector and had to just live with it. Tech Armor, suggests that you install this while in your bathroom after running the shower to lightly steam the room and get the dust to drop. It worked so well, that two time now I have had no dust or air bubbles under the screen!!!! LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: ShawnS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the third purchase of Tech Armor glass. I purchased two screen protectors over a year ago (one for my phone, one for my husband). I just purchased the third to replace my original. This glass screen protector has withstood countless drops (we have a 3 year old). It finally bit the dust with a small crack. Because my screen underneath was in pristine condition, I gladly repurchase this screen protector. I love how clear the screen looks at all times, unlike those sticky plastic covers.
customer_reviews.author: swoods

customer_reviews.title: This is not really easy to do!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions, but STILL needed to pull the screen back from the corner a bit to clear a bubble. It just never seemed to want to adhere well to that corner again. There is probably minimal adhesive in the first place, but it was probably my fault. I originally gave this only 3 stars... but as I type this, it probably was at LEAST partly my fault. OK after a few months I had learned to ignore the few places where the adhesive didn't quite take... but then "new" places started to show up. I can no longer recommend this product for the "do it yourselfer".
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product to anyone who is considering purchasing it
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector works wonders. My daughter has tried every case under the sun- otter box, life proof, speck, etc.- and has cracked her phone countless times. This protector takes the first shot- when she drops her phone hard enough, it cracks and leaves her phone safe. The product even has a warranty so if you break the protector- which my daughter successfully did within the first 2 weeks of buying it- they will send you a new one free of charge! It is much less expensive than repairing the screen which usually costs upwards of $80. I highly recommend this product to anyone who is considering purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: JSD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty unobtrusive little protective device
customer_reviews.text: Pretty unobtrusive little protective device. Wish I'd taken the advice to apply it in the bathroom as the steamy environment helps keep dust at a minimum, since I did get one tiny little piece of dust under the adhesive. Oh well! I know better for next time/if I break this one somehow. Update: just replaced this after dropping my phone face-down on a rocky driveway and cracking it a little in a couple different places. The screen itself is completely flawless. I'm super happy with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Viki

customer_reviews.title: Phone screen stays so much cleaner now!
customer_reviews.text: This Tech Armor Apple Premium Ballistic Glass Screen Protector was one of the items on my sister's Christmas wish list. I purchased it and gave it to her this past Christmas. She has commented more than once how much she likes it already. She says the best part about in her opinion is that her phone screen doesn't get nearly as dirty as her old one did, and it wipes clean much easier now with this Glass Screen Protector. If it truly saves her screen from all scratches or a possible crack in case her phone gets dropped, then it will be a VERY worthy purchase indeed!
customer_reviews.author: CaliRosiePosie

customer_reviews.title: Easiest install ever
customer_reviews.text: One of, if not the best protectors i have come across in terms of ease of installment. Even with a mess up and a redo, it reapplies itself with no bubbles, unlike many other protectors I’ve tried. Can’t wait to see how it protects my screen when the dog decides to use my phone as a chew toy. If it works, I’ll definitely be back for another! Everything about it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: I finally broke down and bought him an iphone 5 along with a better case and gorilla glass
customer_reviews.text: My husband (township worker) dropped his iphone 4 (with case) and shattered the glass. I finally broke down and bought him an iphone 5 along with a better case and gorilla glass. Only 3 months into him having the phone, he drops it in the yard on the only rock from about 3 feet in the air. We thought the phone screen was shattered but we peeled back the gorilla glass and it was shattered and not the phone itself! What a relief! I will gladly pay $6 to protect the screen that the repair shop wants $90 to fix and it comes with a lifetime warranty! You cannot go wrong with this product! Buyer for life!
customer_reviews.author: nancypoo

customer_reviews.title: You need this if you have and iPhone 5.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It was a little tricky removing the old glass. I ended up using a tip of a safety pin. Be careful not to scratch the phone glass. Once I was able to get the pin under the old glass cover, it lifted up all around without issue. Also be VERY careful if you are using a hair dryer to lightly melt the glue. I googled to find out hold to remove the old glass. This new glass does what it supposed to do without looking cheesy. I'm happy with the replacement glass cover.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Star

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime warranty is only two replacements
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 6 different Tech Armor screen protectors for all my apple products because of the clean install " no bubbles". But after you get your two replacement warranties Tech armor will let you know that your lifetime warranty is up. Seems like profit is more important versus customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Hex

customer_reviews.title: Great protector easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my original screen protector that my dog cracked when he picked up my iPhone 5s and dropped it on the patio. Easy to apply. Use cloth to clean the iPhone and use labels to clean any residual dust, remove backing over adhesive side of protector and position over phone. I lined up the bottom first and then over the rest. Tech Armor emails you the instructions but I received the product the day before the email. I seen the hints online and followed them and within 5 minutes from start to finish my iPhone 5s looks brand new. No bubbles, very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A

customer_reviews.title: This is the one and only glass screen protector I will recommend and use
customer_reviews.text: This is the only glass screen protector that I will buy or recommend. It goes on like a charm and actually works as expected. Other glass screen protectors are just made to cover the screen, not to actually protect the actual screen from breakage. I've had several phones with this screen protector that have taken some nasty falls, and the protector works. This is a few dollars more than a couple of the other screen protectors out there (plastic and glass). Spend a couple of extra dollars and go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: V. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and company!
customer_reviews.text: Our phones are an investment; yes, and our lifelines. When I had cheap phones, flimsy (worthless) screen protectors were good enough. An expensive phone deserves real protection. As careful as I try to be, my phone took a header off the nightstand. Picking it up I saw a shattered screen, or so I thought. Peeling off the protector I saw my screen was intact! Also,Tech Armor’s customer service is second to none, getting back to me in less than 15 minutes when I had a problem with an order, and resolving the matter immediately.
customer_reviews.author: DollyB

customer_reviews.title: dishonest company
customer_reviews.text: When I bought product in 2016 there was no charge for shipping to fulfill lifetime warranty. Now there is a charge and it doesn't matter that there were no such conditions at time of purchase. Very dishonest company. Product lasted 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: mew2

customer_reviews.title: I fortunately haven't yet put the screen protector to the test
customer_reviews.text: I fortunately haven't yet put the screen protector to the test, but it seems very good quality. It applied to the screen without any difficulty, and if it weren't for the edges it would be unnoticeable. - One tip: practise aligning the protector before exposing the adhesive. Get used to how much space there is around the sides when it is perfectly aligned. This can make it easier to install it once the adhesive is exposed. The only area I could suggest an improvement is in the optional adhesive buttons. If they were higher quality that'd be really nice. They feel pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: rjsilva

customer_reviews.title: Tested Twice: Saved my screen 2/2
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd Tech Armor tempered glass screen protector and could not be happier. I've had enough experience with this product to vouch for it. The first fall: iPhone slipped out of my hands and hit three metal shelves on it way to the hard floor. Second fall: iPhone flew off my lap when getting out of a car and landed screen-first on the corner edge of a curb. Both times, the screen protector cracked. I carefully removed it, and there is still not a single scratch on my iPhone screen. Very impressive screen protector... affordable price... will purchase again and again... 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: aredjeep

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Phone Several Times
customer_reviews.text: These glass screen protectors have saved my phone several times. I left my phone on the hood of my car, drove off, and my phone landed in the street. When my phone was returned to me hours later my screen was perfectly intact. I have a toddler and my phone has survived many drops and slams. I recently dropped my phone face down on our driveway concrete, the glass protector fractured (as it's intentioned so it absorbs the shock) and my actual screen is unharmed. I also prefer the feeling of a glass protector over others that I've had in the past because it feels and looks like the actual phone screen.
customer_reviews.author: TrueBlue3

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector- easy to install, looks great, and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cell phone screen protector-- this is the first time I've ever been able to quickly and cleanly put on my screen protector with not redos or settling for less than perfect results. The process was really clearly explained in the instructions, and the tools included made installation a snap. My phone looks great and you can't even tell there is a screen protector. However when a toddle recently threw my phone across the parking lot onto rocks I was so happy to see that this "invisible" protector works well and my phone survived without a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: JHF

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Buyer
customer_reviews.text: Liked my first one so much I bought another one for the new phone! Just installed the new one so I really can't judge its performance yet, but, if it's as good as the one on my old phone (3 years without any issues), I will be very happy. I don't anticipate having to use the warranties that accompany this product, but the company's lifetime guarantee is impressive. (Note: despite being a product whose installation is generally intuitive, Tech Armor provides a well-produced and easy to follow video installation guide.)
customer_reviews.author: APUSMAN

customer_reviews.title: Out with the old... in with THIS!
customer_reviews.text: My old screen protector for my 5S died a while ago... ( The edges peeled back and collected dirt, etc in combination with my very poor quality Incipio case. Live and learn, I guess. I've had this screen protector on for one day now and I immediately noticed it is more sensitive to my touch than the bare screen. It looks great and definitely reduces fingerprints. Time will tell in regard to scratch resistance, etc, but I have high expectations. I'll edit later if problems arise. Install was extremely easy and went on the first time in perfect position. So far so good! Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 3KIDFAM

customer_reviews.title: Best protection for a great price! You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time i got this product. I just accidentally smashed my phone screen while walking against a sharp metal edge with a lot of strength. The Tech Armor Ballistic Glass got destroyed, but the phone screen under it was intact! (which I thought impossible considering that the shock was way harder than a normal phone falling on floor situation). This saved me from paying the $120 USD cost of screen replacement I just bought this product again. Would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Mochi

customer_reviews.title: These are so good, I have purchased (2) already
customer_reviews.text: I will never go back to flimsy screen protectors. These are so good, I have purchased (2) already! I am VERY clumsy and it has saved my phone numerous times. I thought I had cracked the screen but it was just the protector that was shattered after dropping it face down on concrete w/o a case. Seriously consider purchasing these, because it is more of an investment instead of having to replace broken screens for hundreds of dollars. Also, since it gives the surface a few cm more in depth, some phone cases have a harder time fitting/sliding on, just buy cases that you can try on in store or something. I would make the adjustment to protect the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a new phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this & installed (easily!) on my iPhone 5s. Didn't realize how much screen quality I'd lost until I installed the Tech Armor ballistic glass protector. As soon as I saw how easy it was to install, the quality of the product, and how much better my iPhone looks I ordered on for my iPad!
customer_reviews.author: G. E. Naughton

customer_reviews.title: A Loyal Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tech Armor and their products! I've been using their screen protectors on my family's devices for years. I'm on my third ballistic glass protector, which means that they have saved my iPhone screen twice. (One drop just chipped a corner, so I'll never know for sure if the screen would have been damaged. But the other drop--there's no doubt about that one. It would've destroyed my phone!) I've had to deal with their customer support a few times over the years, and each time they've gone way above and beyond in ensuring a good experience. If there was a cheaper product, I wouldn't even consider it.
customer_reviews.author: JustJohn

customer_reviews.title: Beware.
customer_reviews.text: After following directions to apply the shield, I left the phone overnight to adhere. I through the shield away. There were no air bubbles after applying the shield, but growing air bubbles surfaced in the morning. In the morning when I put the Tech 21 rubber case on my phone, the glass shield peeled off. Gratefully, there was no residue left on my phone; hence, 2 stars instead of one. This product is not worth the money it cost me.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesotan

customer_reviews.title: Poor material
customer_reviews.text: After a while, screen senses wrong position of my fingers. If I remove the protector, my screen works fine. I think there is a flaw in the material how it conducts electricity.
customer_reviews.author: KOKOMOMO

customer_reviews.title: Ballistic glass seems like a mighty good idea
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I bought a screen protector for my iphone SE mainly because others had bought them. I'm not sure how insecure the screen is on an iphone. This screen protector seems very solid, well planned out and well built. Having used the iphone before putting the protector on the screen, I found the screen press to be duller, that is a key has to be pressed harder or a second time. Typing on a keyboard display takes a little getting used to. This is not enough of a problem to make me want to remove the screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: RKinBedford

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Wow I wish I had bought this for my 4s. This screen protector rocks. My daughter installed it and it had a strange halo at first, which I think was caused by the cleaner she used on the phone. So she very carefully slide it back off re-cleaned the phone (let it dry) and slide the protector back on. I've now had it on for 3 weeks and my phone responds perfectly and the screen it looks clear. I'm using a case that doesn't protect the screen at all and this has protected it from several knocks with my keys.
customer_reviews.author: SF Gator Mom

customer_reviews.title: Why is there no hole for the light sensor? :(
customer_reviews.text: We had this brand and style of screen protector on our old iPhone 4 and while it is a good screen protector, there is no hole for the light sensor. This causes the screen to become active during phone calls very often, and often times you hit the mute button. Not the end of the world, but is VERY frustrating, because it happens a lot. I don't know why they don't have a hole for it. They show one in the picture, so we thought they had added it to this model, but when we got it, it did not have it.
customer_reviews.author: 07MINI

customer_reviews.title: Great product and works awesome
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the glass cover. I had a lifeproof case on my iPhone for two years while I was under contract but it was pretty beat. I wanted to keep my phone and get a new case and screen protector. I love it it's so clear not big and test I have dropped my phone and the glass isn't cracked. The phone is good and the screen protector is still perfect. This is my new go to product when I do decide to upgrade. The only downside, is on the iPhone 6 there is a space between the screen protector and the edge of the case. I'm hoping they will update and fix that
customer_reviews.author: kindlefire2

customer_reviews.title: easy install, no compromise of touch sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: This Tech Armor glass screen protector for iPhone SE (& 5/5s/5c) was, with concise included printed instructions and I-get-it web videos, more quickly and easily installed than I expected. Had no problems with dust bubbles or tweaking the alignment over about three tries to get it right - the protector was easily levered upward from screen by fingernail and repositioned. And, now installed, there’s no apparent lessening of touchscreen sensitivity - it’s as if there’s no overlay compromising screen function. Seems great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mumper

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: I had a Tech Armor screen on my phone when I was working on a roof and had the phone in my back pocket. When I came off the roof and grabbed my phone the screen was cracked so I thought After looking harder at it I realized it was the Tech Armor screen that was cracked but my phone screen was fine. I credit the Tech Armor screen in saving my phone screen. Thanks for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Mine was defective
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions exactly and it fit perfectly. After I got it on, however, there was a distinct outline of a piece of tape on the inside of the glass (the sticky part) which cannot be removed. I cleaned my phone according to their instructions and there is no way to clean the sticky side of the glass. I don't like looking at it and will be replacing it with another brand. Big inconvenience to have to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: excellent product! bought this brand for my S5
customer_reviews.text: excellent product! bought this brand for my S5...dropped the phone several times and finally broke the protective lens. It easily peeled off on one piece - no damage at all to my phone. Then, the best part, i contacted the company and within 2 days had a replacement in my hands at no cost! No shipping, no warranty charge...just a free replacement lens (they advised 7-14 days for delivery so i was very happily surprised to receive in 2 days). Folks if you need a protective cover for your phone (everyone should) i highly recommend to buy this brand. EXCELLENT in all ways. (I bought this lens for my daughter's iPhone)
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL KRULEE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen protector.
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen protector. It is a perfect fit for my iPhone 5s and it paired perfectly with my Spigen Tough Armor case. I am an electrician in plant and I often leave my phone on my table while I service equipment or make a repair. At the end of the day, I use a clean lint free cloth to wipe my phone and it looks just like new. I did not buy the case and screen protector to protect against dropping and abuse. I bought them to protect against all the dirt and dust in my plant and they are doing an excellent job. I am looking forward to pairing them on my iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: It Makes my Phone Feel Protected
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have had it on my phone since I got the phone, so I can't compare the touch sensitivity before and after, but I rarely have any sort of issue with touch responsiveness. The glass is thin, it fits in my otterbox commuter series, no problem. There is a little bit of bubbling under the glass in one corner, but that is from where I had to peel the glass of my first phone that stopped working after about a week. These protectors are not designed to transfer from phone to phone. The seal was great on my first phone, but in an effort to save $10 a reused this one with only minor bubbling.
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: Glass protectors are here to stay.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, perfect cut outs. I get this protector for my mum iPhone 5 and she loves it. The only problem is that the protector is so perfectly cut that leaves no room to use a case. After applying the protector it moves and lift a little when put back the phone in the UAG case. Now the protecto is off a little just with the home button, but is ok, my mom doent bother that much. The feeling of the glass over the previous plastic protectos is great. Usually the phone is loose in the purse with coins and keys and the plastic screen protectors lasted only a few weeks. This glass one will last for long.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Baez

customer_reviews.title: Not the Product for me
customer_reviews.text: Update: Yes, it went on well. I purchased it on the recommendation that I would be able to see the screen on my iPhone 5s better when outside & taking pictures. It did NOT make it easier to see the screen outdoors. And In a short time it started loosening at the edges. I let the company know and questioned what I could do to fix the problem. I did get a response, but Tech Armor had too many steps for their suggested replacement and I didn't have the time, or desire, to deal with it, and there was no mention that it should perform better outdoors. My choice - I tossed it
customer_reviews.author: Juniperberry72

customer_reviews.title: I definitely love this screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I definitely love this screen protector. I drop my phone, a lot. A real lot. I have a decent case to help protect phone, but I definitely have seen this screen protector save The screen. Couple of weeks ago I took my case off for a day and dropped my phone on the pavement. The phone itself was toast, and the screen cover fractures all over it. But when I peeled off the screen cover the original screen on my phone was 100% intact without any signs of damage. I will be buying the screen cases from tech armor as long as I have phones
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Woodhouse

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install/Perfect Screen Protection
customer_reviews.text: I've used flexible screen protectors with previous phones (four of them to date.) But this time I wanted a bit more protection. The how-to installation video on YouTube was a nice touch (kudos to Tech Armor customer service.) But, in actual fact, the ballistic glass screen protector is WAY easier to install than a flex screen protector. (And, at the same time, in no way hinders the phone's touch ID & touch screen features. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Emeg42

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied with this purchase. Some screen protectors are kind of hard to get on and get those pesky bubbles out. I don't know if it was just luck or this product is just that awesome, but I didn't even have any bubbles to try and get out. Went on smoothly and perfectly the first try. Great and seems very durable. Do yourself and your phone a favor
customer_reviews.author: JahRebel RastafariTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve ever used. When it died, bought same again
customer_reviews.text: Definitely reccomend! Comes with everything needed to properly clean device and execute a flawless(no air bubbles) application. Fits perfectly, even with the case I have on my phone. Applied properly your phone screen looks and performs like nothing is there. Scratch-proof even with sharp house keys stored in same pants pocket. Oil repelling coating lasts for multiple years. I bought one in September 2016 and didn’t have to replace it until Jan 2018 when it eventually cracked. Old cover came off cleanly allowing for fast replacement with new cover
customer_reviews.author: justin spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the temper glass screen protector for my iPhone 5c and it looks amazing. The screen looks crystal clear and the screen protector feels sturdy and quality made. It definitely gives me an ease of mind since my phone cover leaves my screen unprotected. If you are looking for a quality screen protector, this is it. The only advice I have it to touch the middle of the screen once you have place the screen protector and have the card handy and ready to take out any air bubbles. I don't have any air bubbles and my screen looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: andy92

customer_reviews.title: Glass Screen Protector Is Easily Installed And Crystal Clear
customer_reviews.text: The directions provided for attaching the protective glass screen to my iPhone 5SE were super easy to follow. I especially liked that items were included with the glass screen protector to clean off my phone, so that previous finger smudges would not be caught beneath the new glass protector. My phone screen is so crystal clear that I can’t tell there is a glass covering it.
customer_reviews.author: Candida Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional seller and probably the best customer service I've seen for an online seller
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional seller and probably the best customer service I've seen for an online seller! The corner of my screen protector didn't stick so I emailed the seller to find out about getting a replacement. Within minutes I received an email with a link where I entered my order number and email and immediately received notice that a new one will be shipped out. It doesn't get any easier than that! Fantastic product and customer service! With the exception of the corner not sticking down (I'm sure it's just a random defect), I am so highly impressed by this product! I can feel the quality and the clarity is AMAZING! So much better than the plastic screen protector I was using!
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: Ballistic Glass: Easiest installation yet!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest protectors I've ever installed. The ballistic glass isn't floppy like most protectors, so once you have the screen cleaned and the protector aligned, it basically seats itself bubble-free after just one end of the screen touches. If you see that unwanted lint under the screen, immediately pull the screw back up, clean and drop it back on. I just applied the screen yesterday so I can't comment much beyond the application process but it sure looks and feels solid! The beveled edges look really nice and the glass is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great protector
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector saved my phone, I purchased it for everyone's phone at home. My son removed the case from his phone and thankfully not the screen protector and the screen still intact, the protector its doing its job. As a matter of fact the edges of the protector a damaged from protecting the phone - that would have been his screen. I upgraded my phone to the Iphone 6 plus and that protector is not as good as this one.
customer_reviews.author: JEOV

customer_reviews.title: Broke after five months
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector was easy to use and install, but it broke after a little less than five months of normal use (no unusual trauma to the phone.) Most screen protectors I have had in the past have lasted at least a year before cracking. While I definitely appreciate that this product protected my phone from damage for five months, I bought a different brand when I replaced this screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on just follow directions. If you have a problem with dust turn on the hot water in the bathroom and let it steam up it will get the dust to settle down so you can put the glass on. TIP take a flashlight and set it down next to your phone so it shines light across the screen so you can see any dust because even the smallest particle will cause a bubble. If you install it correctly it will look like it came on the phone and if you have bubbles it's not the product it's most probably you.
customer_reviews.author: The Green Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to the plastic screen protectors. These are great!
customer_reviews.text: This an excellent screen protector. My favorite thing about it is how easy it is to install with out any air bubbles. I finally gave up on installing the flimsy plastic protectors and had my wife do it. I was never able to get them to install with out bubbles somewhere. This one went on for me with no trouble at all and is completely bubble free. It does have some minor scratches on it from regular use. but not noticeable unless you are looking for them. The feel of the glass for touch screen navigation is far superior to the plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Will Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protector! just have to be patient when applying it.
customer_reviews.text: Its almost like theres nothing on the screen. For the price youre getting a pretty good deal on screen protector. the only downside to this screen protector is making sure its spotless clean. I had the hardest time since i couldn't find a decent place where there wasn't any dust particles in the air so the adhesive side of the protector kept attracting particles. Good thing they include little stickers to get rid of those pieces or else i would have lost my mind. Putting it on isnt hard. Simply align the earphone to the home button and you got it.
customer_reviews.author: Renz

customer_reviews.title: Missing suction cups but otherwise fine
customer_reviews.text: This product took some brainstorming to apply because the suction cups were not included in my package. Tech Armor was great and offered to replace it INSTANTLY but I was impatient and wanted to use my new iPhone. I ended up using the suction cups on my kids toothbrush holders haha whatever it worked fine. I am really happy with it but the company needs to pay attention to what's in the box, I'd buy it again though!
customer_reviews.author: SBH

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: easiest and best screen protector. all the tech armor screen protectors are great but i decided to try the glass since its more scratch resistant and the highest clarity. this one was far easier to put on than the plastic ones because it is stiffer so there was zero problem with bubbles- they just automatically went away in about 5 seconds and i had a perfectly clear screen. the only thing i would comment on is because this glass type is a little thicker than the plastic ones, my finger isnt used to the feel of the extra thickness, especially when clicking the home button on my iphone 5. not a big deal though. works great!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. It is very thick and without a case, it is very prominent. However, it is offering a lot of protection, so that is the compromise. I purchased this for my daughter for her 5C and she doesn't like to put a case on it. If it were me, I'd have a case on the whole phone and include this protective screen cover. I have another "popular" brand that I paid more than three times as much for and this so far appears to be just as good (and easier to install). There is no loss in touch sensitivity on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Koehl

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny - Quality Screen Protector!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second screen protector from Tech Armor. The first screen did it's job and protected my phone's screen after I dropped it. The screen protector cracked, but easily pulled off without splintering. The phone's screen was UN-damaged and there were no blemishes from where the screen was cracked. The installation of this screen protector is fairly straight forward and goes of effortlessly (especially when in a steamy bathroom). The quality and clarity of this screen protector make is almost invisible and the iPhone 5s finger scanner is not impeded. Love this product and would recommend it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, but not teen proof (but what is?)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. The last one died protecting my niece's phone. Her screen is fine, so I'd say this thing did it's job. If you're getting it for a youngster, I'd suggest buying two. They are durable, but you know teenagers... Having one on hand to replace the one destroyed by your teen without waiting for even Amazon's amazing delivery is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: tlk

customer_reviews.title: This screen protector is amazing, I have dropped my phone several times and ...
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is amazing, I have dropped my phone several times and no damage. The a couple of weeks ago while walking I dropped my phone on concrete. The screen shattered. I came in and heated the screen protector with a blow dryer and lifted it off. It was only the screen protector that was shattered. My iPhone was perfect!!! I immediately ordered another tech armor screen protector and have installed it my iPhone. This is a must have for expensive equipment. I also have one on my iPad. You cannot go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector that is not costing you an arm ...
customer_reviews.text: Great screen protector that is not costing you an arm and a leg. I had to replace my old screen protector that broke, The old one cost me $35, which I thought is outrages for a screen protector. After it broke I decided to look for cheaper alternative and found this one. It it cheap, and looks the same as my older one, so I am happy with it. I do not see why I have to spend so much on a screen protector that anyway will last for 2 years max until I upgrade my phone. So far I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector... For a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I want to say that this product has done a good job of protecting my phone. I have dropped my it plenty of times, and my phone (and the screen protector) remain intact. However, after a couple of months, the edges of the screen protector have this strange shiny rainbow glare. My guess is that it is starting to become loose. I'm pretty sure I installed it right, as this is a new problem. Great protection, but it doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: New favorite screen protector!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these: one for mothers day, one for fathers day, and one for myself. We all absolutely love these screen protectors. They are easy to install; I installed mine and didnt have any bubbles the first time! My parents, whom are in their 50s, also installed theirs without incident. The videos are helpful for visual learners. I received these screen protectors almost two days before their expected arrival date. The shipping packaging was safe and protective, and compact. I really enjoy this screen protector and will buy more if I ever drop my phone and break it! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor L.

customer_reviews.title: since the first one did such a great job. The screen protector is easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one for an iPhone SE. My wife dropped the phone on our marble tile, which shattered the glass screen protector, but left the phone unharmed. We then purchased another Tech Armor screen protector, since the first one did such a great job. The screen protector is easy to put on and does not bubble. Highly recommended, especially in comparison to the outrageous pricing for similar products at retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: vikastus

customer_reviews.title: Saved my phone screen!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected and saved my phone! Easy enough to install. No bubbles. I did get a piece of dust in between it and the phone, but that was probably my fault and not the product's. I dropped my phone on its corner once (it also had a case on) and the only damage was a crack across the corner of the screen protector, not the phone. I wish the edges around the home screen button cutout were rounded to make it feel more natural, but overall this is a great product. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing screen protector!
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is amazing. I don't know why I never got one before. I'll never go without one again. It was relatively easy to install on my iPhone 5s. I thoroughly cleaned the phone 1st as suggested, then carefully placed this onto the screen after removing the adhesive backing. It basically "adhered" itself to the phone. I took my time. Results are astonishing! The feel of the glass is identical to the actual screen of the phone itself. I highly recommend this Ballistic Glass screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: 1blood

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Applied easily with no bubbles. Occasionally my case catches the edge and lifts up a small section of the corner of the cover, but luckily I haven't trapped any dust underneath, so pressing the cover back down solves the problem. The stickers for the home button that come with this cover work well, though mine shifts slightly over time, as in it twists a bit and the square icon is no longer "squared" until I press and twist on it to correct the angle. I'm sure the sticker won't last forever, but I've had the cover on for nearly two months now and that is holding up awesome.
customer_reviews.author: cgall

customer_reviews.title: I thought that it will be super durable. It is not
customer_reviews.text: Cracked without any excessive force. My phone was laying on the bed and I slightly knocked it with the hook of my shirt hanger. An hour later I noticed two hair-thin cracks. Not sure what "ballistic" means. I thought that it will be super durable. It is not. It looks nice, but it doesn't do the job. I bought 2 for iPhone 5s and one for iPhone 6s. 2 out of 3 cracked within the first 3 months after the purchase. I give the product 2 stars for the cool look and super easy installation. But the protective quality is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tzanev

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Was scared to put it on because I was afraid to get bubbles, but as long as you clean it with all of the equipment that is provided, you should have no problems with it and you will love it. It feels awesome. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 2nd order: After several droppings, I ordered a second one. Honestly love this product, easy to put on, feels great!! Highly recommend for the klutz. 3rd order: broke after a couple of days! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Saved my phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I bought it for my iPhone 5s. I've dropped my phone multiple times on hard surfaces without a scratch! However lately, I dropped my phone face down on a wood floor. Knowing there would be no damage, imagine my utter shock to see my screen was cracked. After calming myself down from the panic attack that ensued, I realized that my phone screen was not cracked, but the Tech Armor Ballistic Glass Screen Protector was cracked. What a huge sigh of relief!!! I feel this product saved my phone, and is a super easy fix. Peel it off, and put a new one on!! I give it 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dsmith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Screen Cover and Awesome Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Tech Armor Iphone 5S screen cover because I had dropped my previous Iphones and cracked the screen. I have now dropped my new Iphone 5S several times and the Tech Armor ballistic glass has protected it every time. The ballistic glass has cracked, but my screen is intact. Since Tech Armor offers a lifetime warranty I emailed them immediately and received a new one within a couple of days. Very impressive product and an even better warranty! I highly recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Ballew

customer_reviews.title: Got this screen protector to tide him over for awhile and it is working great! Easy application
customer_reviews.text: My son cracked his iPhone screen. Was still usable but the glass was rough to run fingers across. Got this screen protector to tide him over for awhile and it is working great! Easy application. Screen is now smooth as can be to run fingers across, and still usable, in spite of the large cracks under the protector. Getting a second one for other child...BEFORE her screen gets damaged :)
customer_reviews.author: Molly R.

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to apply and I ended up with no bubbles ...
customer_reviews.text: This was installed on an older iPhone 5s. Had never put a screen protector on it, was just very careful. These glass screen protectors are a different breed than the older plastic film ones. VERY easy to apply and I ended up with no bubbles or dust specks. At this price and with so little impact on appearance, I will now use screen protectors on my iStuff! Very good job, Tech Armor!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bradley Neff

product_meta.title: Tech Armor Apple iPhone 5 Ballistic Glass Screen Protectors for Apple iPhone 5C / 5S / 5 / Se (2016) [3-pack]
feature_bullets: Compatible Model(s): iPhone 5C / 5S / 5 / SE (2016) by Apple [3 Pack]

WHAT IS TECH ARMOR BALLISTIC GLASS . Tech Armor Ballistic Glass (.3mm) Screen Protectors look and feel amazing. Experience your iPhone 5 Retina display the way it was intended. From scratches to high impact drops enjoy maximum protection.

HOW DOES TECH ARMOR BALLISTIC GLASS WORK . Tech Armor Ballistic Glass is the affordable way to protect your iPhone 5 screen from scratches and drops. Only premium materials and expert design go into this Best In Class product.
Case friendly. Works with most iPhone 5 / 5s / Se (2016) cases and won’t interfere with Installation.
No Bubble, easy install, and perfect fit. (PLEASE CONTINUE READING BELOW)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars12,279 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
